intrigue: you meet a frankly suspicious man. First, he approaches and pushes you unceremoniously towards a table on which are placed three mysterious cups. He then offers you to play a game: you must draw a cup randomly, and receive the reward it holds, whatever it may be. While you were observing the items sitting on the table, he slips behind you and doesn't seem like he wants to let you go. To get out of this situation, you choose to play his game. Which cup are you taking ?

goblets.desc: The one made out of metal, very old-looking and engraved with a dragon head
goblets.name: metal

goblets.desc: The biggest of the three, made out of a material you cannot even identify
goblets.name: biggest

goblets.desc: The last one, carved in blue wood, and sparkling in such a way that it seems enchanted
goblets.name: sparkling

life: You carefully lift the {goblet} goblet, only to find out that there is nothing underneath. With both disappointment and anger, you slap away the two other cups. Finding nothing under them once again, your blood turns cold, and you turn around to face the scammer. Sadly, you realized everything a bit too late, and what meets your eyes is an enlarging fist. You lose **{amount}ğŸ’”**.
time: You gently lift the {goblet} goblet and notice a coin underneath it. Unfortunately, the man, taking advantage of your brief, dazed joy, grabs the coin and runs away. You come back to your senses and chase after him, but unfortunately do not manage to catch up that guy. You lose **{amount}ğŸ•‘** because of this detour.
nothing: You slowly lift the {goblet} goblet, only to find out that there is nothing underneath. Disappointed, you turn around and leave. Who knows, you might have better luck next time.
end: Facing your lack of any reaction, the man tries to rob you. Noticing his sinister maneuvers, you take out your weapon and viciously threaten him. Scared, he knocks you down with a punch, before fleeing. You lose **{amount}ğŸ’”**.
